headline: Gartner: Reiterate Buy Rating As Underlying Momentum Stays Intact
summary: Gartner's key segments like Global Technology Sales and Global Business Sales show solid demand. Read why I maintain a Buy rating on IT stock.

headline: Gartner Marketing Survey Finds Nearly Half of Consumers Expect to Buy More American Goods Amid Economic Uncertainty
summary: STAMFORD, Conn., May 14, 2025--Forty-seven percent of consumers expect to buy more American-made products this year, according to a survey by Gartner, Inc.

raw.headline: Gartner Marketing Survey Finds Nearly Half of Consumers Expect to Buy More American Goods Amid Economic Uncertainty
raw.summary: STAMFORD, Conn., May 14, 2025--Forty-seven percent of consumers expect to buy more American-made products this year, according to a survey by Gartner, Inc.

headline: CFOs pull back on raises with a 29% drop in compensation growth plans
summary: New data from Gartner shows CFOs are much less likely to give out large compensation increases this year than they were previously.

raw.headline: CFOs pull back on raises with a 29% drop in compensation growth plans
raw.summary: New data from Gartner shows CFOs are much less likely to give out large compensation increases this year than they were previously.
